attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that we need to stop men who have kids here and leave and get married elsewhere. they should not be allowed to bring their wives here when they dont support their children. my daughters dad left us both 6 months ago and didnt tell me anything. he got married in pakistan and is trying to bring his wife here. its not right or fair. he doesnt support me with my daughter and he has broke both our hearts. I want and im sure alot of people want this to be stopped. please help us.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
